entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 09:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain this morning then to flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
